name: virustotal-premium
label: VirusTotal Premium
description: VirusTotal Premium Services are used to get more threat context and exposes advanced threat hunting and malware discovery endpoints and functionality. This connector facilitates the automated operations related to analyze retro hunts, search intelligence, livehunt notifications, livehunt rulesets, and download files from VirusTotal.

fields.title: Server
fields.description: Specify the server URL of the VirusTotal Premium server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API key that is configured for your account to access the VirusTotal premium server.
fields.name: api_key

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Widget Rendering URL
operations.description: Retrieves a URL from VirusTotal that renders a widget within an iframe and is valid for three days.

parameters.title: Indicator
parameters.tooltip: Specify the file hash (md5, sha1 or sha256), URL, IP address, or a Domain.
parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Specify the file hash (md5, sha1 or sha256), URL, IP address, or a Domain.

parameters.title: Foreground Color
parameters.tooltip: Specify the theme for foreground color in hex notation.
parameters.name: fg1
parameters.description: Specify the theme for foreground color in hex notation.

parameters.title: Primary Background Color
parameters.tooltip: Specify the theme for primary background color in hex notation.
parameters.name: bg1
parameters.description: Specify the theme for primary background color in hex notation.

parameters.title: Secondary Background Color
parameters.tooltip: Specify the theme for secondary background color in hex notation.
parameters.name: bg2
parameters.description: Specify the theme for secondary background color in hex notation.

parameters.title: Border Color
parameters.tooltip: Specify the theme for border color.
parameters.name: bd1
parameters.description: Specify the theme for border color.

operations.title: Get Widget HTML Content
operations.description: Retrieves the actual HTML content of the widget report for a given observable.

parameters.title: Token
parameters.tooltip: Specify the token provided by the Get Widget Rendering URL operation response.
parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Specify the token provided by the Get Widget Rendering URL operation response.

operations.title: Submit File
operations.description: Scans and analyzes files submitted to VirusTotal from FortiSOAR™ to determine if it is suspicious based on the Attachment ID or File IRI you have specified.

parameters.name: input
parameters.title: Type
parameters.description: Type of file that you want to submit to VirusTotal for analysis. Type can be an Attachment ID or a File IRI.

parameters.name: value
parameters.title: Reference ID
parameters.description:
Reference ID that is used to access the attachment metadata from the FortiSOAR™ Attachments module.
In the playbook, this defaults to the{{vars.attachment_id}} value or the {{vars.file_iri}} value.

operations.title: Submit URL for Scanning
operations.description: Scans and analyzes the URL submitted to VirusTotal to determine if it is suspicious based on the URL you have specified.

parameters.title: URL
parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Specify the URL that you want to submit to VirusTotal for scanning.

operations.title: Get IP Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves a report from VirusTotal for the IP address submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the IP address you have specified.

parameters.title: IP
parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: Specify the IP address for which you want to retrieve a VirusTotal report.

parameters.title: Relationships to Include
parameters.name: relationships
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the relationships such as Comments, Graphs, etc. that you want to include in the output of this operation.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select the relationships such as Comments, Graphs, etc. that you want to include in the output of this operation.

operations.title: Get Domain Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves a report from VirusTotal for the domain submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the domain name you have specified.

parameters.title: Domain
parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Specify the domain name for which you want to retrieve a VirusTotal report.

parameters.title: Relationships to Include
parameters.name: relationships
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the relationships such as Comments, Graphs, etc. that you want to include in the output of this operation.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select the relationships such as Comments, Graphs, etc. that you want to include in the output of this operation.

operations.title: Get URL Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves a report from VirusTotal for the URL submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the URL you have specified.

parameters.title: URL
parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Specify the URL for which you want to retrieve a VirusTotal report.

parameters.title: Relationships to Include
parameters.name: relationships
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the relationships such as Comments, Graphs, etc. that you want to include in the output of this operation.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select the relationships such as Comments, Graphs, etc. that you want to include in the output of this operation.

operations.title: Get File Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves a report from VirusTotal for the file that you have submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the file hash value you have specified.

parameters.title: File Hash
parameters.name: file_hash
parameters.description: Specify the File Hash of the file for which you want to retrieve a VirusTotal report.

parameters.title: Relationships to Include
parameters.name: relationships
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the relationships such as Comments, Graphs, etc. that you want to include in the output of this operation.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select the relationships such as Comments, Graphs, etc. that you want to include in the output of this operation.

operations.title: Get File Or URL Analysis Report
operations.description: Retrieves details of a File or URL analysis from VirusTotal for the File or URL that you had submitted for scanning and analysis to VirusTotal using the "Submit File" or "Submit URL for scanning" action.

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Select the type, either File or URL, whose analysis details you want to retrieve from VirusTotal.
parameters.tooltip: Select the type, either File or URL, whose analysis details you want to retrieve from VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Analysis ID
parameters.name: analysis_id
parameters.tooltip:
Specify the ID of the File or URL analysis whose details you want to retrieve from VirusTotal.
Note: To retrieve the analysis ID, you can use the "Submit File" or "Submit URL for scanning" operation.
parameters.description:
Specify the ID of the File or URL analysis whose details you want to retrieve from VirusTotal.
Note: To retrieve the analysis ID, you can use the "Submit File" or "Submit URL for scanning" operation.

operations.title: Download File
operations.description: Downloads VirusTotal report for a specified file from VirusTotal based on the hash value of the file you have specified.

parameters.title: Hash Value
parameters.description: Specify the SHA-256, SHA-1, or MD5 of the file for which you want to retrieve a VirusTotal report.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the SHA-256, SHA-1, or MD5 of the file for which you want to retrieve a VirusTotal report.

operations.title: Create ZIP File
operations.description: Creates a password-protected ZIP file with the VirusTotal files based on the hash values of the VirusTotal files and the password you have specified.

parameters.title: Hashes
parameters.description: Specify the list of comma-separated hash values of the files based on which you want to create a zip file in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: hashes
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of comma-separated hash values of the files based on which you want to create a zip file in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Password
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the password for protecting the ZIP file that is being created with VirusTotal files.
parameters.name: password
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the password for protecting the ZIP file that is being created with VirusTotal files.

operations.title: Get ZIP File Status
operations.description: Retrieves information of the ZIP file from VirusTotal based on the zip file ID you have specified.

parameters.title: ZIP File ID
parameters.description: Specify the file identifier of the ZIP file for which you want to retrieve the zip file information from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the file identifier of the ZIP file for which you want to retrieve the zip file information from VirusTotal.

operations.title: Get ZIP File URL
operations.description: Retrieves a signed URL from where you can download the specified ZIP file from VirusTotal based on the zip file ID you have specified. Note: The retrieved URL expires after 1 hour.

parameters.title: ZIP File ID
parameters.description: Specify the file identifier of the ZIP file for which you want to retrieve a signed URL from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the file identifier of the ZIP file for which you want to retrieve a signed URL from VirusTotal.

operations.title: Download ZIP File
operations.description: Downloads a zip file from VirusTotal based on the zip file ID you have specified.

parameters.title: ZIP File ID
parameters.description: Specify the file identifier of the ZIP file that you want to download from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the file identifier of the ZIP file that you want to download from VirusTotal.

operations.title: Get PCAP File Behaviour
operations.description: Retrieves a PCAP file from VirusTotal based on the report ID you have specified. A PCAP file is generated while analyzing the file’s behavior in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Report ID
parameters.description: Specify the Report ID of the sandbox from which you want to retrieve the PCAP file from VirusTotal. A PCAP file is generated while analyzing the file’s behavior in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: sandbox_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Report ID of the sandbox from which you want to retrieve the PCAP file from VirusTotal. A PCAP file is generated while analyzing the file’s behavior in VirusTotal.

operations.title: Search Intelligence
operations.description: Searches for files in VirusTotal using the query and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.description: Specify a query in the key: value pair using which you want to search files in VirusTotal. For example, content: "hello World".
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: Specify a query in the key: value pair using which you want to search files in VirusTotal. For example, content: "hello World".

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.name: order
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the order in which you want to sort the results retrieved from VirusTotal. Note: If your 'Query' parameter contains content search, then the 'Order' parameter does not have any effect.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the order in which you want to sort the results retrieved from VirusTotal. Note: If your 'Query' parameter contains content search, then the 'Order' parameter does not have any effect. For e.g last_submission_date-, last_submission_date+, etc.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10 and maximum allowed limit is 300.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10 and maximum allowed limit is 300.

parameters.title: Descriptors Only
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option to return the full object information. Clear this option (default) to return just the object descriptors.
parameters.name: descriptors_only
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option to return the full object information. Clear this option (default) to return just the object descriptors.

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: (Optional) The 'Cursor' parameter is used only if a previous operation had returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, then the value of the cursor element includes a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: cursor
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The 'Cursor' parameter is used only if a previous operation had returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, then the value of the cursor element includes a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls. For e.g eJwNysEOgjAMANBfgpEdPYhbTEnaXaoLvc5E6MbJA9jw8frO78wWHWn0KdSBGD5wmyrx2DAsKgoD2qiSwREXL_pqskXDjO7_-9nFY-ZHR3o9Etde9L0j446hfNGKT3layZaG9-cKrbucP-HbJOI=

operations.title: Create Livehunt Ruleset
operations.description: Creates a livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal based on the ruleset name, rules, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Ruleset Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the hunting livehunt ruleset that you want to create in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the hunting livehunt ruleset that you want to create in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Rules
parameters.description: Specify the rules based on which you want to create the hunting livehunt ruleset in VirustTotal.
parameters.name: rules
parameters.tooltip: Specify the rules based on which you want to create the hunting livehunt ruleset in VirustTotal.
parameters.placeholder: e.g. rule foobar {strings: $ = "foobar" condition: all of them}

parameters.title: Enabled
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option (default) to 'enable' the livehunt ruleset that you want to create in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: enabled
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option (default) to 'enable' the livehunt ruleset that you want to create in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 100.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 100.

parameters.title: Notification Emails
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the list of comma-separated notifications emails using which you want to create the livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: notification_emails
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the list of comma-separated notifications emails using which you want to create the livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.

operations.title: Get Livehunt Rulesets List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of livehunt rulesets from VirusTotal based on the filter and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the filter using values of certain attributes, for example, filter=enabled:true, based on which you want to filter the livehunt rulesets retrieved from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the filter using values of certain attributes, for example, filter=enabled:true, based on which you want to filter the livehunt rulesets retrieved from VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.name: order
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the order in which you want to sort the results retrieved from VirusTotal. Note: If your 'Filter' parameter contains content search, then the 'Order' parameter does not have any effect.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the order in which you want to sort the results retrieved from VirusTotal. Note: If your 'Filter' parameter contains content search, then the 'Order' parameter does not have any effect. For e.g creation_date+, creation_date-, etc.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10 and maximum allowed limit is 40.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10 and maximum allowed limit is 40.

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: (Optional) The 'Cursor' parameter is used only if a previous operation had returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, then the value of the cursor element includes a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: cursor
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The 'Cursor' parameter is used only if a previous operation had returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, then the value of the cursor element includes a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls. For e.g eJwNysEOgjAMANBfgpEdPYhbTEnaXaoLvc5E6MbJA9jw8frO78wWHWn0KdSBGD5wmyrx2DAsKgoD2qiSwREXL_pqskXDjO7_-9nFY-ZHR3o9Etde9L0j446hfNGKT3layZaG9-cKrbucP-HbJOI=

operations.title: Get Livehunt Ruleset Details
operations.description: Retrieves details for a specific livehunt ruleset from VirusTotal based on the ruleset ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Ruleset ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the livehunt ruleset for which you want to retrieve details from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the livehunt ruleset for which you want to retrieve details from VirusTotal.

operations.title: Update Livehunt Ruleset
operations.description: Updates a specific hunting livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal based on the ruleset id, ruleset name, rules, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Ruleset ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the livehunt ruleset that you want to update in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the livehunt ruleset that you want to update in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Ruleset Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the livehunt ruleset that you want to update in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the livehunt ruleset that you want to update in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Rules
parameters.description: Specify the rules based on which you want to update the hunting livehunt ruleset in VirustTotal.
parameters.name: rules
parameters.tooltip: Specify the rules based on which you want to update the hunting livehunt ruleset in VirustTotal.
parameters.placeholder: e.g. rule foobar { strings: $ = "foobar" condition: all of them }

parameters.title: Enabled
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option (default) to 'enable' the livehunt ruleset that you want to update in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: enabled
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option (default) to 'enable' the livehunt ruleset that you want to update in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 100.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 100.

parameters.title: Notification Emails
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the list of comma-separated notifications emails using which you want to update the livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: notification_emails
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the list of comma-separated notifications emails using which you want to update the livehunt ruleset in VirusTotal.

operations.title: Delete Livehunt Ruleset
operations.description: Deletes a specific livehunt ruleset from VirusTotal based on the ruleset ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Ruleset ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the livehunt ruleset for which you want to remove the livehunt ruleset details from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the livehunt ruleset for which you want to remove the livehunt ruleset details from VirusTotal.

operations.title: Get Livehunt Notifications List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all livehunt notifications from VirusTotal based on the filter and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the filter using values of certain attributes, for example, filter=tag:my_rule, based on which you want to filter the livehunt notifications retrieved from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the filter using values of certain attributes, for example, filter=tag:my_rule, based on which you want to filter the livehunt notifications retrieved from VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.name: order
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the order in which you want to sort the results retrieved from VirusTotal. Note: If your 'Filter' parameter contains content search, then the 'Order' parameter does not have any effect.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the order in which you want to sort the results retrieved from VirusTotal. Note: If your 'Filter' parameter contains content search, then the 'Order' parameter does not have any effect. For e.g date+, date-, etc.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10 and maximum allowed limit is 40.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10 and maximum allowed limit is 40.

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: (Optional) The 'Cursor' parameter is used only if a previous operation had returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, then the value of the cursor element includes a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: cursor
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The 'Cursor' parameter is used only if a previous operation had returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, then the value of the cursor element includes a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls. For e.g eJwNysEOgjAMANBfgpEdPYhbTEnaXaoLvc5E6MbJA9jw8frO78wWHWn0KdSBGD5wmyrx2DAsKgoD2qiSwREXL_pqskXDjO7_-9nFY-ZHR3o9Etde9L0j446hfNGKT3layZaG9-cKrbucP-HbJOI=

parameters.title: Count Limit
parameters.name: count_limit
parameters.description: Optional) Specify the maximum count of notifications that this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 200, and the maximum value that can be set is 10,000.
parameters.tooltip: Optional) Specify the maximum count of notifications that this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 200, and the maximum value that can be set is 10,000.

operations.title: Get Livehunt Notifications Files List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all file objects for livehunt notifications from VirusTotal based on the filter and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the filter using values of certain attributes, for example, filter=tag:my_rule, based on which you want to filter the file objects for livehunt notifications retrieved from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the filter using values of certain attributes, for example, filter=tag:my_rule, based on which you want to filter the file objects for livehunt notifications retrieved from VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10 and maximum allowed limit is 40.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10 and maximum allowed limit is 40.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The 'Cursor' parameter is used only if a previous operation had returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, then the value of the cursor element includes a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.title: Count Limit
parameters.name: count_limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum count of notifications that this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 200, and the maximum value that can be set is 10,000.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum count of notifications that this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 200, and the maximum value that can be set is 10,000.

operations.title: Get Livehunt Notifications Details
operations.description: Retrieves details for a specific livehunt notification from VirusTotal based on the notification ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Notification ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the livehunt notification for which you want to retrieve details from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the livehunt notification for which you want to retrieve details from VirusTotal.

operations.title: Get Livehunt Rule Files List
operations.description: Retrieves a hunting livehunt ruleset from VirusTotal by hunting notification files relationship in VirusTotal based on the ruleset ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Ruleset ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the ruleset for which you want to retrieve the associated hunting livehunt ruleset from VirusTotal by hunting notification files relationship in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the ruleset for which you want to retrieve the associated hunting livehunt ruleset from VirusTotal by hunting notification files relationship in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10 and maximum allowed limit is 40.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10 and maximum allowed limit is 40.

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: (Optional) The 'Cursor' parameter is used only if a previous operation had returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, then the value of the cursor element includes a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: cursor

operations.title: Create Retrohunt Job
operations.description: Creates a Retrohunt job in VirusTotal based on the rules, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Rules
parameters.description: Specify the rules based on which you want to create the Retrohunt job in VirustTotal.
parameters.name: rules
parameters.tooltip: Specify the rules based on which you want to create the Retrohunt job in VirustTotal.
parameters.placeholder: e.g. rule demo { strings: $ = "demo" condition: all of them }

parameters.title: Notification Emails
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the list of comma-separated notifications emails using which you want to create the Retrohunt job in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: notification_emails
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the list of comma-separated notifications emails using which you want to create the Retrohunt job in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Corpus
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the dataset you want to scan with the job that you want to create in VirusTotal. You can between Main or GoodWare.
parameters.name: corpus
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select the dataset you want to scan with the job that you want to create in VirusTotal. You can between Main or GoodWare.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to create the Retrohunt job in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: start_time
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to create the Retrohunt job in VirusTotal.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the ending DateTime till when you want to create the Retrohunt job in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: end_time
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the ending DateTime till when you want to create the Retrohunt job in VirusTotal.

operations.title: Abort Retrohunt Job
operations.description: Aborts a specific Retrohunt job in VirusTotal based on the job ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Job ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the Retrohunt job that you want to abort in VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the Retrohunt job that you want to abort in VirusTotal.

operations.title: Get Retrohunt Jobs List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all Retrohunt jobs from VirusTotal based on the filter and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the filter using values of certain attributes, for example, filter=tag:my_rule, based on which you want to filter the Retrohunt jobs retrieved from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the filter using values of certain attributes, for example, filter=tag:my_rule, based on which you want to filter the Retrohunt jobs retrieved from VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10 and maximum allowed limit is 40.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10 and maximum allowed limit is 40.

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: (Optional) The 'Cursor' parameter is used only if a previous operation had returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, then the value of the cursor element includes a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: cursor
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The 'Cursor' parameter is used only if a previous operation had returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, then the value of the cursor element includes a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls. For e.g eJwNysEOgjAMANBfgpEdPYhbTEnaXaoLvc5E6MbJA9jw8frO78wWHWn0KdSBGD5wmyrx2DAsKgoD2qiSwREXL_pqskXDjO7_-9nFY-ZHR3o9Etde9L0j446hfNGKT3layZaG9-cKrbucP-HbJOI=

operations.title: Get Retrohunt Job Details
operations.description: Retrieves details for a specific Retrohunt job from VirusTotal based on the job ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Job ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the Retrohunt job for which you want to retrieve details from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the Retrohunt job for which you want to retrieve details from VirusTotal.

operations.title: Get Retrohunt Job Matching Files
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all Retrohunt job matching files from VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Job ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the Retrohunt job for which you want to retrieve details from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the Retrohunt job for which you want to retrieve details from VirusTotal.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 10.

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: (Optional) The 'Cursor' parameter is used only if a previous operation had returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, then the value of the cursor element includes a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: cursor
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The 'Cursor' parameter is used only if a previous operation had returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a cursor element, then the value of the cursor element includes a cursor parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls. For e.g eJwNysEOgjAMANBfgpEdPYhbTEnaXaoLvc5E6MbJA9jw8frO78wWHWn0KdSBGD5wmyrx2DAsKgoD2qiSwREXL_pqskXDjO7_-9nFY-ZHR3o9Etde9L0j446hfNGKT3layZaG9-cKrbucP-HbJOI=

operations.title: Delete Retrohunt Job
operations.description: Deletes a specific Retrohunt job from VirusTotal based on the Retrohunt job ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Job ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the Retrohunt job that you want to delete from VirusTotal.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the Retrohunt job that you want to delete from VirusTotal.
